sentences: Dave Raun (born June 7, 1970) a resident of Fresno, California, is the drummer for the seminal California punk rock band Lagwagon.
Additionally, Raun drums for the punk rock cover band/supergroup Me First and the Gimme Gimmes, with fellow Lagwagon member Joey Cape.
Raun joined Lagwagon in 1996, replacing original drummer Derrick Plourde.
Most recently, he has been seen drumming for Hot Water Music and Black President. Raun is married to Laura Slippy.
